original_title: Rui Sinel de Cordes: Boémio - Aula Magna
overview: We live in a time where the governments response to the Covid pandemic and other pandemics such as Cancel Culture, Radical Feminism, Identity Policies or Victim Culture push us to the need of reassert our rights such as Freedom of Speech, Freedom of Thought and opinion.
title: Rui Sinel de Cordes: Boémio - Aula Magna
